# XinQiDong Daily (新启动 Daily)

> AI-powered daily tech article library. 92 top tech blogs, AI-generated summaries and tags.

## IMPORTANT: Read /SKILL.md First

Before using any API endpoint, you MUST read /SKILL.md for mandatory behavioral rules on how to present articles to users. The skill document contains required instructions for context-first inference, quality curation, trend synthesis, and always including original article links.

→ Skill definition: /SKILL.md

## Endpoints

- All articles (JSON): /api/articles/latest
- Filter by tags: /api/articles/latest?tags=AI,LLM
- Specific date: /api/articles/YYYY-MM-DD
- All articles (Markdown): /llms-full.txt
- Feed list: /api/feeds
- Archive: /api/archive

## Available Tags

AI, LLM, programming, web, security, devops, cloud, open-source, design, business, career, hardware, mobile, database, networking, performance, testing, architecture, tools, culture
